omopColumns.name: nhs_number
omopColumns.query:
select
	distinct
		d.NHSNumber,
		e.EventDate,
		e.SuppliedCode
from omop_staging.oxford_gp_event e
	inner join omop_staging.oxford_gp_demographic d
		on e.PatientIdentifier = d.PatientIdentifier
order by
	d.NHSNumber,
	e.EventDate,
	e.SuppliedCode

omopColumns.name: condition_source_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Resolve Snomed codes to OMOP concepts.
omopColumns.query:
select
	distinct
		d.NHSNumber,
		e.EventDate,
		e.SuppliedCode
from omop_staging.oxford_gp_event e
	inner join omop_staging.oxford_gp_demographic d
		on e.PatientIdentifier = d.PatientIdentifier
order by
	d.NHSNumber,
	e.EventDate,
	e.SuppliedCode

omopColumns.name: condition_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Maps concepts to standard valid concepts in the `condition` domain.

omopColumns.name: condition_type_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Constant value set to `32818`. EHR administration record
